summary: A young man from an army family with a long tradition of honour and distinction goes to a military academy as an officer cadet and finds himself temperamentally unsuited to the life.
cast: Roland Culver|Gareth Forwood|James Cosmo|Stephen Sheppard|Clive Francis|James Hazeldine|Oliver Cotton|Larry Dann|David Rowlands|John Wentworth|Laurence Hardy|Moray Watson|John Nettleton|Graham Lines|Raymond Adamson|Lewis Wilson|Norman Mann|Norman Mitchell|Margaret Lang|Christopher Cunningham|Ron Conrad|Stephen Carter|Laurie Goode|Colin Haigh|Mark Kirby|Peter Kodak
title: Sovereign's Company
